fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Bite down on a player at night, secretly granting them a Basic Attack that will hit whoever they visit the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If they kill you, you will appear as the last role Bella disguised you as, if any, and killed by Edward or Jacob, whoever has killed more people.
Bella’s disguises on you are permanent.
If they visit a Vampire player that isn’t you, nothing happens.
Vampire Fixation: Your effect lasts an additional night.
